Happy Presidents Day!üá∫üá∏ Today, we honor the great men who have led the United States of America toward a more perfect Union. Who is your favorite Commander in Chief? Let me know!‚¨áÔ∏è

Thank you, @WXXV25, for speaking with me about the most pressing issues facing our home and our nation.

My prayers are with the family of Congressman Jim Hagedorn, a great patriot and public servant. May God bless his family at this difficult time.

I had a great time with the Gautier Rotary Club this afternoon, speaking with community leaders about my work in Washington. As an Appropriator and a member of the American Security Caucus, I‚Äôm at the front of the fight against rising inflation and illegal immigration. https://t.co/XzsSgEvwK4

I spent the day in Forrest County, learning more about Petal High School‚Äôs polymer and lineman technical courses. These programs arm students with the practical skills they‚Äôll need as they join the workforce. https://t.co/bOtvszKJQg

I joined my colleagues on the Border Security Caucus to invite ICE and CBP leaders to answer questions about the disaster at our southern border. The American people deserve transparency about what‚Äôs being done to protect our border states. https://t.co/7yLRd06f3a

Hattiesburg continues to earn the nickname ‚ÄúHub City‚Äù with its many successful small businesses & manufacturing facilities. Today, I met with community leaders about our shared mission of bringing production back to America & attracting high-earning jobs to our great state. https://t.co/gFoUZcocKC

Healthcare workers have every right to protect their conscience, just as much as any other profession. I was proud to cosponsor this bill to stop our government from forcing physicians to perform abortion procedures that betray their beliefs. https://t.co/qSWxAjW7QM

This weekend, 14 police officers across our country were shot and wounded in the span of just 24 hours. These violent attacks are the consequence of the anti-cop campaign fueled by the media and elected officials. These attacks on our men and women in blue must stop.

I will keep fighting Biden‚Äôs bad-for-business policies in Washington to protect our craftsmen at home. https://t.co/d3l7lZAMhd

This weekend, my team presented a Congressional Record to the family of Builder Chief Petty Officer Raymond Border. It was an honor to be a part of the dedication ceremony of the Raymond Border Fitness Center in Gulfport and to honor the legacy of a great man and valiant Seabee. https://t.co/wKvisIcBvg

What a beautiful day in Hattiesburg to celebrate good news for USM & our service members. The Quinlan-Hammond Hall of Honor is a beautiful facility where our students in uniform can study and share their stories. I‚Äôm proud to see my alma mater honor those who have served. #SMTTT https://t.co/o9tqLtJgyP

It was great catching up with Lieutenant Governor Hosemann & Representative Barton this week, thank you for all that you do for our great state. https://t.co/o9lvwKz4kP

It was great to see my former colleague, Bryant Clark, in Jackson and to present him with my new congressional challenge coin. Representing my home in the Mississippi State Capitol was a great honor and I‚Äôm grateful to continue my service to our great state in Washington. https://t.co/HIXKTOgxig

Congratulations to Command Sergeant Major John Raines, the 13th Army National Guard Command Sergeant Major. I also extend my sincerest thanks to CSM Sampa for his leadership and service. The @USNationalGuard is blessed to be led by such great men. https://t.co/gqyXAYq3Sc

Thank you, @MSyallpolitics for having me on to discuss issues that matter to Mississippians. Joe Biden‚Äôs weak leadership is turning every state into a border state and I shared with @frankcorder what I‚Äôve done to help prevent this man-made disaster. Listen here‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/QDXEHogeHc

We spoke about the excellent programs MGCCC offers to help our students succeed as they pursue a degree. Great speaking with you both! https://t.co/bdySAnXKiO

Americans are paying for Biden‚Äôs anti-energy policies with their wallets and safety. I‚Äôm proud to fight these bad policies with my Republican colleagues to help lower prices, create American jobs, and protect our national security. Hear more‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/gSnUfHd6XK

Congratulations to Micah Hill, south Mississippi‚Äôs 2021 Congressional App Challenge winner! I chose Micah‚Äôs project as this year‚Äôs winner because it was not only an impressive display of her STEM capabilities, but an investment in her future as well. Congrats, Micah! Great work.

Struggling to put food on the table isn‚Äôt funny to Americans.

Joe Biden promised to kill the spread of COVID-19 and failed. To date, he‚Äôs only successfully killed jobs, businesses, and our children‚Äôs educations.
Democrats‚Äô habit of labeling anyone who doesn‚Äôt agree with them as ‚Äúterrorists‚Äù is a dangerous and disgraceful tactic.

The Biden Administration‚Äôs failure at the southern border has had costly consequences. Cartels are profiting while Americans are paying with their tax dollars, safety, and lives. On National LEO Appreciation Day, I‚Äôd like to extend a sincere thanks to the officers who risk their lives everyday to protect our neighborhoods. Your resolve, dedication, & bravery has not been forgotten. I‚Äôm proud to support our LEOs in Congress, to defend those who defend us.

Hearing politicians compare September 11th, 2001 to January 6th, 2021 is heartbreaking. America deserves better than leaders who smear our history and disrespect our shared tragedies for political clout.
Retweet if you‚Äôve felt whiplash from the CDC‚Äôs flip flopping on COVID-19 guidelines.
Under this administration, public health has taken a backseat to politics.
When Joe said, ‚Äúthere is no federal solution,‚Äù he really meant: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt have a single clue.‚Äù
Americans are fed up with this absentee administration.

OSHA has no right to put a stranglehold on the medical decisions of Americans. I stood with my colleagues to block this bureaucratic encroachment on your fundamental liberties. Read more‚¨áÔ∏è

https://t.co/O6gZQgepA9
Joe Biden doesn‚Äôt have a plan for this virus or rampant inflation. Americans are paying for his poor leadership with their hard earned money and their health.
Merry Christmas, south Mississippi! May God bless you and your families as we remember the REAL reason for this holiday season.üåü https://t.co/ozMGGUFqYJ
This holiday season, Acts 20:35 is close to my heart, which encourages us to remember the words of Jesus, ‚Äúfor he himself said, ‚ÄòIt is more blessed to give than to receive.‚Äô‚Äù
Americans don‚Äôt need anyone‚Äôs permission to celebrate Christmas with their families. ESPECIALLY not from an out of touch and hypocritical White House.

Let me be clear:

‚úÖ I fully support brick-and-mortar infrastructure investments in roads, bridges, harbors, dams, ports, & military installments.

‚ùå I will never support a socialist wish list disguised as infrastructure.

Mississippi deserves better than superficial solutions.
When you get on a plane to see your family this holiday season, just remember: you may be sitting next to an illegal immigrant. Why? Joe Biden bought them a ticket with your tax dollars.
Mississippians won‚Äôt forget that the Biden Administration continues to lie to their faces. We‚Äôre actively paying for the inflation you caused, Joe! https://t.co/sF20UWqvP8
Americans are having trouble paying to heat their homes, put food on the table, and fuel their cars. Democrats are having trouble accomplishing anything to help between their endless witch hunts.
Food security is national security, and the AQUAA Act is a great step toward meeting the food demands of our nation¬†and the world.

I introduced the Advancing Quality and Understanding of American Aquaculture (AQUAA) Act with @RepEdCase. 

This bill has been tirelessly improved to fight for action on better food quality, origin transparency, boosting our economy¬†& reducing reliance on foreign seafood imports.

Raising the debt ceiling is an invitation to more reckless spending. Mississippians are already feeling pressure from inflation this holiday season. I will keep voting NO on any measure that lets Democrats off the hook for the consequences of their socialist agenda.

The Enhanced Use Leasing Extension Act enables NASA to cut operating costs, improve facility conditions, & increase mission effectiveness. These elements benefit taxpayers by cutting costs & increasing security. I‚Äôm proud to cosponsor this good news for Mississippi & our nation.

Today the National Guard celebrates 385 years of being ready to help when our communities need it most. I‚Äôm proud to be a guardsman in Congress & Co-Chair the National Guard & Reserve Caucus to support those who drop everything to be there for us. Happy Birthday @USNationalGuard! https://t.co/SltYzDhr8H

My heart goes out to the families impacted by tornados over the weekend. Mississippi is no stranger to loss due to natural disasters and we know it takes a village to recover. Please join me in praying for Arkansas, Kentucky, Illinois, Missouri, Tennessee, and our great state.

Happy Birthday, Mississippi! Our great state celebrates its 204th birthday today and I could not be more proud of how much our home has accomplished and contributed. I‚Äôm proud to work for the Magnolia State and the Mississippians who call her home. https://t.co/tIsRJwa2yP

Fentanyl overdoses are higher than ever & it‚Äôs time for Congress to act. I cosponsored a bill to permanently make fentanyl a Schedule 1 drug. I‚Äôm deeply proud of this stand for life, but until Joe Biden closes our border, the dangers of fentanyl will keep overwhelming our nation.

Congratulations to Columbia High School‚Äôs football team for winning their second state championship! The Wildcats took home the trophy after a nail biting game, scoring 22-21. Congratulations Columbia High!

Joe Biden took 50 million barrels of oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve as a desperate attempt to lower fuel prices with no plan to increase production. My bill, HR 6176, is a step toward fixing his mess & prioritizing our energy independence when the White House refuses.

I was deeply honored to receive the Charles Dick Medal of Merit from the National Guard Association of the United States. I‚Äôm proud to be a guardsman in Congress & humbled by the recognition of my work as co-Chairman of the National Guard & Reserves Caucus. Thank you, @NGAUS1878. https://t.co/8VY7F0paHF

I am 100% AGAINST federal vaccine mandates. I cosponsored a bill to  prohibit federal agencies from mandating COVID vaccines for employers of contractors or subcontractors. Mississippians are losing their jobs for exercising their constitutional freedoms and I won‚Äôt stand for it.

In Joe Biden‚Äôs America, legal citizens are held to rigid vaccination and testing requirements to travel. Meanwhile, illegal invaders are escorted into our country without COVID tests, vaccines, or visas. I signed a letter to urge the President to reconsider this hypocrisy.

Democrats are pushing a government takeover of private sector lenders. We can‚Äôt have a sole government loan provider without compromising the efficiency & fraud protection that competition ensures. I cosponsored HR 6037 to support small businesses & reduce risks for taxpayers.

I‚Äôm proud to help the hard-fought win of the improved NDAA. This amendment ends Biden‚Äôs cuts to our ship building, missile defense, & military personnel. It also includes the bill I introduced with @RepTimRyan to help our active duty military to continue serving in reserve units.

On #PearlHarborRemembranceDay, I think of my grandfather who fought in the Pacific during WWII. He inspired me to enlist after hearing of his service & sacrifice as a Marine. Thank you, to everyone who served alongside my grandfather & to every man and woman still serving today. https://t.co/raNUGGP4HK

On Dec. 7, 1941, our greatest generation was attacked. Lives were taken by the attack on #PearlHarbor & many others were willfully risked to defend our nation during WWII. I salute the generations of service members who have helped our nation stand strong for another 80 years.

I do NOT want a government shutdown. However, Democrats have gridlocked the House of Representatives to jam through their socialist agenda. We have a responsibility to the American people to govern, this outrageous & irresponsible spending cannot continue.
Your family is less safe because of Joe Biden‚Äôs open border.

Bob Dole was not only an exemplary leader of the Republican party and a dedicated public servant, he was also a member of the America‚Äôs greatest generation. A war hero and a great leader- our nation is better off because of Senator Dole‚Äôs service. May he Rest In Peace.

I was one of the first in the House of Representatives to support legislation to protect parental rights in regards to our children‚Äôs education and medical decisions. Parents have a right to keep their child safe and ensure our schools are solid stepping stones for success.

I never thought I‚Äôd see the day that lawmakers are forced to protect parents who just want the best for their child, but when our federal government labels them as ‚Äúdomestic terrorists‚Äù, I won‚Äôt stand idly by.

My good friend, AG Lynn Fitch, is a powerful example for young women. She‚Äôs leading our great state on a mission to protect our unborn children and their mothers from the dangers of abortion and I am proud to fight the good fight alongside her. #EmpowerWomenPromoteLife

As a Catholic, I‚Äôm upset by the politicians & community leaders who claim to have faith yet reject the very principals it‚Äôs founded upon. The most basic way to exercise faith is by following the 10 commandments. 

Perhaps the most well-known of these being: ‚Äúthou shalt not kill.‚Äù https://t.co/IIYVLgHJrD

As a father, I loved my children before they had fingers and toes. Before their hearts were fully formed, they had stolen mine. 

My children and my faith are the reasons that protecting life is a priority and very personal responsibility.

A grave error was made when our constitution was misinterpreted during Roe v. Wade. Our forefathers believed every man, woman, & child has a God-given right to life. Our constitution gives NO caveat for only those who can walk, talk, and speak!
Today, is a historic day. Our nation has an opportunity to affirm that every unborn life is precious and deserves protection under the law. #EmpowerWomenPromoteLife

American people: ‚ÄúGas is too expensive, these high prices are difficult to afford!‚Äù

Biden Administration: ‚ÄúWe have an easy solution, just buy a new car!‚Äù

Once again, the Biden White House struggles to grasp basic monetary consequences.

President Biden placed a travel ban on South Africa while leaving our border to Mexico wide open. This is clearly NOT about the science, so what is this double standard really about? The American people deserve answers.

On December 1st, the Supreme Court will begin arguments on the Dobbs v. JWHO case. I‚Äôm proud of our great state and it‚Äôs leadership for leading the nation in the fight to #EmpowerWomenPromoteLife.

Democrats want to hire 80,000+ federal agents to spy on YOU! The kicker?: They plan to use your tax dollars to do it.

Good luck, Nancy. Mississippians like me won‚Äôt take this violating invasion quietly.
Self-defense is a God-given and constitutional right NOT a concession delivered by the whims of the media.

Democrats have repeatedly tried to mislead the American people with false math, fine print, & failed policy, and Biden‚Äôs Build Back Broke bill is no different. 

Americans have already rejected the policies that they loaded in this bill, but Democrats prefer politics to patriots.

I voted NO on Biden‚Äôs Build Back Broke bill. 

I will NEVER support irresponsible spending to fund abortions, hand out amnesty to illegal invaders, and strengthen our enemies. Mississippians deserve better than this half-baked socialist scam.

I‚Äôm proud to stand by my colleagues in the House and Senate to help introduce a Congressional Review Act to end OSHA‚Äôs vaccine mandate. This requirement is a burden to our businesses and unfair to employers. I‚Äôll take every opportunity to stand against this federal overreach.

The minimum expectation of the leader of the free world is a clean bill of health. This week, I joined my colleagues to introduce a bill that will create a commission responsible for examining the sitting President to determine that he/she is physically & mentally able to govern.

Does it shock anyone that Biden and Pelosi lied?

Estimates from the Congressional Budget Office show that 2 trillion ‚â† $0. Surprise surprise.

Nancy Pelosi is threatening to force lawmakers to spend the holidays in Washington instead of with our families. She‚Äôs hoping it‚Äôll pressure us to ignore the fact that Biden‚Äôs Bloated Budget will cripple our great great great grandkids with debt.

Meeting with the Consul General of France this week was a reminder of how important America‚Äôs allies are. This year, our allies have lost faith in the White House. We can‚Äôt wait to improve these relationships. It‚Äôs time to honor our commitments & repair our nation‚Äôs reputation.

Mississippians won‚Äôt watch bureaucrats try to demolish our jobs and take our freedoms without a fight.
The Biden Administration is toying with the idea of shutting down ANOTHER pipeline. This will mean even more lost jobs, higher energy prices, and a bleaker winter for too many Americans.

Democrats‚Äô IRS Data Reporting Proposal is nothing more than surveillance on Americans. It‚Äôs just another example of the radical progressive polices that take power from the American people and place it in the hands of bureaucrats.

Democrats released the text of a 2,000 page reconciliation package before anyone had a chance to read it- a ploy to ram through far-left policy under the nose of voters. The American people deserve more than Democrats‚Äô endless bag of tricks.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #10: Rural America is likely the greatest victim of Democrats' socialist spending. Kickbacks, earmarks, and bailouts were all made a priority while broadband, crop insurance, and disaster assistance were denied.

President Biden decided that rewarding illegal invaders with amnesty wasn‚Äôt enough. Now, he wants you to foot the bill for a $450,000 incentive for non-American families to cross our southern border.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #9: Americans do NOT want to pay for someone else's badly managed neighborhoods but Democrats insist! The expensive socialist spending package would put Mississippians on the hook to send $200 million to Nancy Pelosi in California.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #8: Biden has made a lot of promises, but has only delivered for non-Americans. His party's socialist wish list grants amnesty to over 8 MILLION illegal invaders and sets them up with a comfortable welfare income at your expense.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #7: No one wants a weaponized IRS spying on our personal info. Even still, Democrats plan to spend YOUR tax dollars to spy on YOUR accounts. Based on the White House‚Äôs targets, the privacy of nearly all taxpayers will be violated.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #6: Democrats‚Äô spending package takes lives and forces you to pay for it. Their policy would put you on the hook to pay for over $2 billion in abortion procedures, regardless of whether you believe precious life should be defended.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #5: Democrats‚Äô prized policies would wreck our energy independence, hike our gas prices (even more believe it or not), and force us to rely on enemies like Russia and China to fuel our way of life.
ATTN STUDENTS: Your apps for the Congressional App Challenge are due Monday, November 1. Don‚Äôt forget to submit them! For more information go to: https://t.co/YS1i31z4S9.

Did you know?: 

If you paid the federal government $1 per SECOND ($86,400/day) it would take you almost 32,000 YEARS to pay for the $1 trillion faux infrastructure plan.

Democrats‚Äô irresponsible spending isn‚Äôt just problematic today, it‚Äôll burden our nation for centuries.

‚ú®Ten Days of Terrible Socialist Policies‚ú®

Day #4: Biden is a self-declared ‚Äúunion guy‚Äù & proves it by cutting big checks. Under the Democrats‚Äô outrageous spending packages, unions will be free to increase dues infinitely & ruin competitive opportunity for non-union companies.

As a father, I know first-hand how vital parental decisions are to protecting the futures of our children. I will stand firmly against any attempt to intimidate parents out of their kids‚Äô classrooms. These scare tactics by the White House are abhorrent and will not be tolerated.
